2072590.name: The Bernard Zakheim Murals: History of Medicine in California
2072590.description: UC San Francisco is pleased to present this virtual experience for viewing a collection of New Deal-era murals by the Polish-born artist Bernard Zakheim. The collection features a 10-panel mural titled the "History of Medicine," which was carefully removed from a seismically outdated building and placed in safe, climate-controlled storage.
2072590.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
